member.name: T:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodSettings
member.summary: CocoaPod settings.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodSettings.ToolPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to pod executable.

member.name: T:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings
member.summary: CocoaPod install settings.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.NoIntegrate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to integrate the pods into an xcode project.
member.value: true to not integrate into a project; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.NoClean
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to clean .
member.value: true if no cleaning should occur; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.NoRepoUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to update the repo.
member.value: true if repo should not be updated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.Silent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output should be silent.
member.value: true if output should be silent; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output should be verbose.
member.value: true if output should be verbose; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodInstallSettings.NoAnsi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the -noansi flag should be set
member.value: true if -noansi flag should be set; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings
member.summary: CocoaPod update settings.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.NoIntegrate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to integrate the pods into an xcode project.
member.value: true to not integrate into a project; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.NoClean
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to clean .
member.value: true if no cleaning should occur; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.NoRepoUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to update the repo.
member.value: true if repo should not be updated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.Silent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output should be silent.
member.value: true if output should be silent; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output should be verbose.
member.value: true if output should be verbose; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.CocoaPods.CocoaPodUpdateSettings.NoAnsi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the -noansi flag should be set
member.value: true if -noansi flag should be set; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Provide additional status output

member.summary: Check if any First Launch tasks need to be performed

member.summary: Builds the given Project NAME

member.summary: Builds the given Target NAME

member.summary: Builds all the targets

member.summary: Builds the given Workspace

member.summary: Builds the given Scheme NAME

member.summary: Use the build configuration NAME for building each target

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.XcConfig
member.summary: Apply the build settings defined in the file as overrides

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Arch
member.summary: Build each target for the given architecture; this will override architectures defined in the project

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Sdk
member.summary: The SDK to use as the base SDK when building the project

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Toolchain
member.summary: Use the given toolchain
member.value: The name or identifier of the toolchain.

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Destination
member.summary: Use the destination described by key value pairs

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.DestinationTimeout
member.summary: The timeout in seconds to wait for while searching for the destination device

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ParallelizeTargets
member.summary: Build independent targets in parallel

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Jobs
member.summary: Specify the maximum number of concurrent build operations
member.value: The maximum number of concurrent jobs.

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.DryRun
member.summary: Do everything except actually running the commands

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ResultBundlePath
member.summary: Specifies the directory where a result bundle describing what occurred will be placed

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.DerivedDataPath
member.summary: Specifies the directory where build products and other derived data will go

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ArchivePath
member.summary: Specifies the directory where any created archives will be placed, or the archive that should be exported

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportArchive
member.summary: Specifies that an archive should be exported

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format that the archive should be exported as (e.g. ipa, pkg, app)

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportPath
member.summary: Specifies the destination for the product exported from an archive

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportProvisioningProfile
member.summary: Specifies the provisioning profile that should be used when re-signing the exported archive; if possible, implies a signing identity

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportSigningIdentity
member.summary: Specifies the codesigning identity that should be used to re-sign the exported archive

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportInstallerIdentity
member.summary: specifies the installer signing identity that should be used during export; this may be inferable from the ExportSigningIdentity

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportWithOriginalSigningIdentity
member.summary: Specifies that the signing identity used to create the archive should be used to sign the exported product original signing identity.

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.SkipUnavailableActions
member.summary: Specifies that scheme actions that cannot be performed should be skipped instead of causing a failure

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportLocalizations
member.summary: Exports completed and outstanding project localizations

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.LocalizationPath
member.summary: Specifies a path to XLIFF localization files

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.ExportLanguage
member.summary: Specifies optional ISO 639-1 target languages included in a localization export

member.name: P:Cake.XCode.XCodeBuildSettings.Clean
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether project should be cleaned.
member.value: true if project should be cleaned; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Export format type.

member.summary: A .pkg installer
